Texts.Chs: 有没有人感觉到宇宙最近好像一直在摇摇晃晃的？
Texts.Eng: Anyone else feel like there's been some cosmic turbulence lately?

Texts.Chs: 野兽猎人
Texts.Eng: Beast Hunter

Texts.Chs: 不敢相信我站在那玩意正中央的时候死了。
Texts.Eng: Can't believe I died when I was right in the middle of something.

Texts.Chs: 如果你需要战斗技艺的帮助，你会在这儿找到我的。
Texts.Eng: Combat is an art, and I am an artist! I'll be here if you need me.

Texts.Chs: 不要担心，我会一直在这儿等到你需要我为止。
Texts.Eng: Don't worry about me, I'll hold up here until you have need of me again, partner.

Texts.Chs: 叶族人会帮你在丛林中中中更有效的狩猎！
Texts.Eng: Floran help you hunt in jungle!

Texts.Chs: 如果你需要战斗，叶族人会帮帮帮你的！
Texts.Eng: Floran here to help you fight if you need it!

Texts.Chs: 叶族人对长期雇用很感兴兴兴趣。你可以给我一份飞船上的工作吗？
Texts.Eng: Floran interesssted in long term employment. Can you give Floran a job?

Texts.Chs: 如果你需需需要我帮你，尽管开口，叶族人是最棒的猎猎猎人！
Texts.Eng: Floran is bessst hunter! Ask Floran if you need help some time.

Texts.Chs: 叶族人想想想要要成为你的船员！
Texts.Eng: Floran wantss to join ship crew!

Texts.Chs: 叶族人会发现并刺刺刺敌人！不过我对这里的地形有点不适应。
Texts.Eng: Floran will find enemy to ssstab! This terrain is not even a bother to Floran!

Texts.Chs: 叶族人会待在这里直到你需要叶族人去刺刺刺或是射点什么东西。
Texts.Eng: Floran will stay here until you need Floran to ssstab or shoot something.

Texts.Chs: 叶族人可以帮你更好地生存存存于丛林中。
Texts.Eng: Floransss sstabbing sskills protect you from jungless.

Texts.Chs: 嘿，伙计，你需要一个称职的船员吗？
Texts.Eng: Hey partner, you lookin' for an ol' starry wanderer to ride with you?

Texts.Chs: 嘿，我是<selfname>，很高兴见到你！
Texts.Eng: Hey, I'm <selfname>, nice to meet ya!

Texts.Chs: 猎人/狩猎者
Texts.Eng: Hunter/Gatherer

Texts.Chs: 我相信我可以在旅行中帮到你。我可以成为你的船员吗？
Texts.Eng: I believe I could aid you in your travels. Perhaps I could become a crew member on your ship?

Texts.Chs: 如果你需要，我可以随时帮助你战斗！
Texts.Eng: I can always lend you my sword and skill in battle, should you need it.

Texts.Chs: 我曾经爬上一个猿人的背，那景色真是棒极了。
Texts.Eng: I climbed an Apex once. Nice view.

Texts.Chs: 伙计。我或许忘记了我来自哪儿，但是我想问我们将要去哪儿？
Texts.Eng: I may forget where I came from, but I know where I wanna go - with you, partner!

Texts.Chs: 我会留守在这里，直到你需要我，船长。
Texts.Eng: I will remain on guard here until you need me, captain.

Texts.Chs: 我会待在这里，直到你需要我。
Texts.Eng: I will stay posted here until you need backup.

Texts.Chs: 如果你需要人保护你，请随时吩咐，我会一直在这里的。
Texts.Eng: I'll be here if you need a warrior to defend you!

Texts.Chs: 如果你需要我帮你，就来找我。
Texts.Eng: I'll coop up here until when ya next need my services.

Texts.Chs: 我能够帮助你更便捷地探索丛林！
Texts.Eng: I'll help us to prowl the jungle unhindered!

Texts.Chs: 我会呆在这儿，如果你打算要我帮忙，记得喊我！
Texts.Eng: I'll hold up here for now. Come say howdy when you need me again, partner.

Texts.Chs: 我觉得我的脚蹼痒痒的。
Texts.Eng: I've got an itchy trigger flipper.

Texts.Chs: 如果我成为你的船员，你是不是能保护我不受大猿人的奴役？
Texts.Eng: If I join your crew, can you protect me from Big Ape?

Texts.Chs: 如果你需要厉害的船员，那么，你找对人了！
Texts.Eng: If yer someone to join your mighty fine star crew, then I'm your huckleberry!

Texts.Chs: 如果你需要打架，请来找我，我会一直在这里。
Texts.Eng: If you need military support, I will be here.

Texts.Chs: 如果你需要人帮你打架，请随时吩咐！
Texts.Eng: If you need someone to help you fight, I shall be here waiting!

Texts.Chs: 如果你需要关于战斗方面的帮助，请来找我。
Texts.Eng: If you need support in the art of battle, you can find me here.

Texts.Chs: 无法无天，不信神的，不会飞的，这就是我！
Texts.Eng: Lawless, godless, flightless - that's me!

Texts.Chs: 让我们找出对我们不利的家伙吧，这里我们将如履平地！
Texts.Eng: Let's find the enemy! This terrain is not even a bother to us!

Texts.Chs: 泥？黏土？哈哈，叶族人说没事事事就没事，快走过去吧。
Texts.Eng: Mud? Clay? Hah. Floran ssstill hunt.

Texts.Chs: 泥？黏土？哈哈，直接走过去。
Texts.Eng: Mud? Clay? Hah. Walk on through.

Texts.Chs: 我的羽毛上全粘上了枪支保养油。
Texts.Eng: My feathers are all gummed up with gun oil.

Texts.Chs: 我所受过的丛林训练可以让你不受丛林环境的干扰。
Texts.Eng: My tough-as-nails training will protect you from jungles.

Texts.Chs: 没有自尊的企鹅和死了有什么分别。
Texts.Eng: No self-respecting penguin would stay dead for long.

Texts.Chs: 没有时间啦！GO~GO~GO！
Texts.Eng: No time to dally - let's ride!

Texts.Chs: 不是所有企鹅都是捣蛋鬼！前面只是句玩笑话，对，我们就是喜欢捣乱！
Texts.Eng: Not all penguins are troublemakers! Who am I kidding, yes we are.

Texts.Chs: 没有什么听起来比在星海中遨游更加振奋人心了，我可以加入你的飞船吗？
Texts.Eng: Nothing sounds as inspiring as travelling through the stars. May I join your ship?

Texts.Chs: 人人都觉得企鹅很可爱，他们想错了。
Texts.Eng: People think penguins are cute. People are wrong.

Texts.Chs: 我十分喜爱星际间的旅行，请问我可以成为你的船员吗？
Texts.Eng: Perhaps the life of a traveller is the one for me? May I enquire about joining your crew?

Texts.Chs: 听说你在找一些船员加入你的队伍？不得不说在星海中遨游是多么美妙的一件事情...
Texts.Eng: Tell me, are you looking for crew members? Because to sail among the stars would be wonderful...

Texts.Chs: 伙计，抓紧时间。
Texts.Eng: Time to ride, partner?

Texts.Chs: 没时间了！快行动。
Texts.Eng: Time to up stakes and go!

Texts.Chs: 在星海中遨游...可能你正在寻找一些得力的船员?
Texts.Eng: To sail among the stars... Perhaps you are looking for some crew members?

Texts.Chs: 我们企鹅无论发生什么事都能保持镇定。
Texts.Eng: Us penguins are unflappable.

Texts.Chs: 嘿，我对你印象很好，要不要雇用我？
Texts.Eng: Y'know, you an' I could get along mighty fine. Fancy hirin' me for your crew?

Texts.Chs: 啊哈，上咯！
Texts.Eng: Yee-haw, let's go!

Texts.Chs: 昨天我笑到差点让鲭鱼把我的喉咙卡住了。
Texts.Eng: Yesterday I laughed so hard I almost choked on my mackerel.

Texts.Chs: 你看起来非常强强强壮。叶族人想要加入你的队伍！
Texts.Eng: You look ssstrong. Floran wants to join you!
